Articles.Content:
Just now, SSTO Crasher said:

I thought I said that the story was to be developed in a ksp save file, also again, the story does not have warp drives

I know. I said torchship-like. My intention was to instead have it be launched on a conventional, but very powerful rocket. Also, it seems that the thread is in enough disarray it will be difficult to develop it in a save file.

 

With that in mind, @Akagiwe do need an image or a craft file to show the ship in orbit around Bop when it is discovered.

17 minutes ago, 4D4850 said:

I know Kamerica doesn't have any right now, but a probe transferring to Jool torchship-style could get there fast. Perhaps taking our most powerful rockets and putting a tiny retrofitted asteroid observation probe?

--Linus Kerman, Chief Intern at KAA (Kamerican Aerospace Agency)

Sure!

I'll send AtomicTech Inc.'s engineers and scientists over and y'all can work out all the little bits.

I'll also send over a few Gamma Cores and a Gamma HLV upper stage for y'all to work with.

9 minutes ago, AtomicTech said:

I'll also send over a few Gamma Cores and a Gamma HLV upper stage for y'all to work with.

Why not MOAR BOOSTERS?

14 minutes ago, AtomicTech said:

Sure!

I'll send AtomicTech Inc.'s engineers and scientists over and y'all can work out all the little bits.

I'll also send over a few Gamma Cores and a Gamma HLV upper stage for y'all to work with.

Good. Perhaps use a three stage system with a VHLS lower stage or some strapped-together Gamma Cores, a VHLS Upper Stage for circularizing, then a Gamma HLV stage as a transfer vehicle to Jool. Alternatively, we could use all the Gamma stuff, and create a new transfer stage.

 

While you get that sent over, we will start work on the first Wau (ϛ) rocket.

8 minutes ago, 4D4850 said:

Good. Perhaps use a three stage system with a VHLS lower stage or some strapped-together Gamma Cores, a VHLS Upper Stage for circularizing, then a Gamma HLV stage as a transfer vehicle to Jool. Alternatively, we could use all the Gamma stuff, and create a new transfer stage.

 

While you get that sent over, we will start work on the first Wau (ϛ) rocket.

Either one works!

*You've got Gamma*

Ok we need to get this in order, I’ll get the save file to you guys as soon as I can, then you should actually put the stuff in ksp and pass on the save file, that is a better way to do this than just talking
I'll sent you the .craft soon!
I think I need to clarify that everyone here has to use current kerbin tech and not like warp tech
Yeah, the carrier uses 16 nervas

KES Nippon is a torchship as well. If you even try to stop us, we'll pulverize the Bop colony.

*2001 theme begins to play*

Arm the D.A.R.T. interceptors! Prepare the railguns! All hands, battle stations!

Here's a drawing of the Nippon since the other computer's recharging after sending Nippon to Bop with a set of giant wings. (Yes, I used the Scratch paint editor)

Spoiler

 

Edited February 9, 2022 by Akagi

This is meant to be a collaborative story in the form of the emiko station by @Just Jim or kerney Kerman’s journal by @adsii1970, we have swayed way off topic, I will get the save file to you guys as soon as I can

Ta-daaaa!

I made us a Fandom page!

https://kar-wars.fandom.com/wiki/Kar_Wars_Wiki
I like it, but remember, it should stay in ksp and the Official story should use ksp tech

I know.

The drive of the KES Nippon, as I have stated twice, is 16 NERVAs.

Thus, the entire ship is fully stock.
Ok and btw, if I have time I will get you the save file soon, and I think for my next entry the kamericans are going to continue their building of the station
Great! For my next entry, today or tomorrow, the KES Nippon will nearly hit a Kamerican Munar lander in LMO.
How about we each take turns writing entries, gameplay, story or both, each in our own style?

Yeah! That sounds cool!

 

i think i would have to cool the jets on the action-adventure space battles though
Ok, but we would need to move the save file around

My made-up organizations:

KEDF: Kerbin Emergency Defense Force

Kappan Exploratory Fleet One: Exactly what it sounds like

anyone can make ships if they want
Ok, but the fleet should be constructed in ksp

Should have clarified. Thanks!

KEDF and KEF 1 go head-to-head in most of my space battles
Also, I would recommend making to battles happen at a weird orbit so that the kamericans don’t get suspicious and opens up a plot hole

yep

like, dres orbit?

 

also, kedf is a coalition of all kerbin's nations

the kamericans know

all the things posted earlier by yours truly? they were on every. single. computer. on. KERBIN!
Yep, no one will see the ships there
